name: Believer's Hands
enabledFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,@feat:believers_boon,@alignment:lg,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

description.text: You can heal others with a touch of your hand.

sections.Benefit: Once per day, you can use the paladin's lay on hands ability. Your effective paladin level is equal to 1/2 your character level (minimum 1). If you already have (or later gain) the lay on hands ability, you instead gain one extra use of lay on hands each day.
sections.Special: This feat counts as having the lay on hands ability for the purpose of qualifying for feats such as Extra Lay on Hands.
